# DropClaimConditions.canClaim() method

Can Claim

## Example

```javascript
// Quantity of tokens to check claimability of
const quantity = 1;
const canClaim = await contract.canClaim(quantity);
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
canClaim(quantity: Amount, addressToCheck?: AddressOrEns): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter      | Type                                  | Description  |
| -------------- | ------------------------------------- | ------------ |
| quantity       | [Amount](./sdk.amount.md)             |              |
| addressToCheck | [AddressOrEns](./sdk.addressorens.md) | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

## Remarks

Check if the drop can currently be claimed.
